p.d: The Hangout Festival is the first and only music festival of it's kind in North America. Located directly on white sandy beaches surrounded by palm trees, the festival treats guests to a unique festival experience and consistently features a diverse selection of top touring artists. This yearâ€™s headliners are The Weeknd, Florence + the Machine, Alabama Shakes, Ellie Goulding, Lenny Kravitz and Haim.
